products.name: Bournville Dark Chocolate bar
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Cocoa and its products, Confectioneries, Bars, Chocolate candies, Chocolates, Dark chocolates
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality cocoa sourced from sustainable farms.","Contains no artificial flavors or preservatives.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Bournville Dark Chocolate is suitable for vegetarians."]

products.name: Organic powerseed bread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Cereals and potatoes,Breads,White breads,Wheat breads
products.facts: ["Made with organic whole grains and seeds for enhanced nutrition.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, promoting natural quality.","Sustainably sourced ingredients, supporting eco-friendly farming practices.","High in fiber and protein, contributing to a balanced diet."]

products.name: Lightly salted rice cakes
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Snacks,Cereals and potatoes,Cereals and their products,Puffed cereal cakes,Puffed rice cakes
products.facts: ["Lightly salted rice cakes are typically made from whole grain rice, providing a gluten-free snack option.","The production process often involves minimal processing, which helps retain the natural nutrients of the rice.","Many brands prioritize sustainable sourcing of rice, contributing to reduced environmental impact.","Lightly salted rice cakes generally contain low levels of sodium, making them a healthier alternative to traditional snacks."]

products.name: Oatmilk
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Dairy substitutes, Cereals and their products, Milk substitutes, Plant-based beverages, Plant-based milk alternatives, Cereal-based drinks, Oat-based drinks
products.labels: No gluten, Vegetarian, Vegan, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Oatmilk is made primarily from oats and water, with additional ingredients such as oils and stabilizers for texture.","Producing oatmilk has a lower carbon footprint compared to dairy milk, making it a more eco-friendly choice.","Oatmilk is often fortified with vitamins and minerals like calcium and vitamin D to enhance its nutritional profile.","It is naturally lactose-free and suitable for those with dairy allergies or lactose intolerance."]

products.name: Strawberry & Cream
products.categories: Beverages, Dairies, Snacks, Sweet snacks, Confectioneries, Carbonated drinks, Dairy drinks, Sodas, Candies, Lollipops, Sweetened beverages
products.facts: ["Contains natural strawberry flavor and real cream for authentic taste.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and colors, ensuring quality and freshness.","Produced with sustainable farming practices to support ecological balance."]

products.name: Marinara Sauce
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Tomato sauces, Groceries, en:pasta-sauces
products.facts: ["Made primarily from tomatoes, garlic, onions, and herbs.","Typically contains no artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring a more natural product.","Many brands source tomatoes from sustainable farms, promoting eco-friendly agriculture.","Quality marinara sauce is often slow-cooked to enhance flavor and texture."]

products.name: Sparkling Melon & Cream
products.categories: Beverages and beverages preparations, Beverages, Dairies, Desserts, Dairy desserts, Carbonated drinks, Dairy drinks, Waters, Sodas, Carbonated waters, Flavored waters, Flavored sparkling waters, Sweetened beverages, en:fermented-drinks
products.packaging: Boîte de conserve ou canette, Canette
products.facts: ["Contains natural flavors and ingredients derived from real melons.","Packaged in a recyclable aluminum can to reduce environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and colors, ensuring a high-quality beverage.","Low in calories, making it a healthier choice for a sparkling drink."]

products.name: pateu porc
products.facts: ["Made primarily from high-quality pork liver and fat.","Sourced from free-range pigs to ensure better animal welfare and taste.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, promoting natural consumption.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact."]

products.name: Activia. Fraise
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Fermented milk products, Desserts, Dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts with fruits, Yogurts, Fruit yogurts, en:bifidus-yogurts
products.facts: ["Activia Fraise is packaged in recyclable materials, reducing its environmental impact.","The yogurt contains live probiotic cultures that support gut health.","Activia sources its milk from farms that follow sustainable farming practices.","The product is made with natural ingredients, ensuring high quality and taste."]

products.name: Natural Unsweetened Cocoa
products.categories: Cocoa and its products, Cocoa and chocolate powders, Cocoa powders
products.labels: Kosher, No artificial flavors, No gluten, No GMOs, No preservatives, No artificial colors, Non GMO project, Orthodox Union Kosher
products.facts: ["Natural unsweetened cocoa is made from roasted cocoa beans that are ground into a powder.","It is typically produced using sustainable farming practices that help preserve the environment and promote biodiversity.","The quality of natural unsweetened cocoa is often determined by its fat content, flavor profile, and absence of additives.","It is rich in antioxidants and has a lower acidity compared to Dutch-processed cocoa, making it a healthier choice."]

products.name: Wheat Thins
products.ingredients_text: whole grain wheat flour, canola oil, sugar, cornstarch, malt syrup (from corn and barley), salt, refiner's syrup, leavening (calcium phosphate and baking soda), bht.
products.categories: Snacks, Salty snacks, Appetizers, Crackers, Wheat crackers
products.facts: ["Wheat Thins are made primarily from whole grain wheat flour.","The packaging is recyclable, contributing to reduced environmental impact.","Wheat Thins contain no artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring quality ingredients.","The product is often made with non-GMO ingredients, aligning with ecological sustainability."]
